item.title: Wallet Upgrade and Bithumb Instructions
item.description: There is a lot happening with Stegos lately, and it’s just the beginning! A new wallet is out, and Bithumb Global is ready for trading. Follow the steps below to stay up-to-date with recent developments and keep your funds secure. The news is out: Stegos is officially trading on Bithumb Global. With the new wallet upgrade, you’ll be able to seamlessly send STG to the exchange in order to trade freely.
